name: Historic Oakland Cemetery
description: Oakland Cemetery is a 48 acre historic cemetery off memorial drive in the heart of Atlanta. Founded in 1850 it is the resting place of a number of famous Atlantans as well as a large number of Civil War soldiers.
parking: Free parking is available in a lot just outside the front gate or along the street on Martin Luther King, Jr. Drive and Oakland Avenue. Parking is allowed inside the cemetery off to the right of any asphalt paved roadway, with enough space for other cars to pass.
